items.title: The Boeing Company (BA) Announces First of its Kind Demonstration
items.description: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is one of the 13 Best Aerospace and Defense Stocks to Invest in Now. On June 16, The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) in collaboration with Royal Australian Air Force announced a successful first-of-its-kind demonstration. Under the demonstration, two uncrewed MQ-28 Ghost Bat aircraft, along with a third digital aircraft, were controlled simultaneously by [â€¦]
